meanings.sent1: Her doctor explained that the cramps were due to her menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent2: The menstrual products aisle at the store is always well-stocked.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat seemed to have a menstrual mood swing.
meanings.sent4: The red and white flowers in the garden bloomed in a menstrual pattern.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a diagram to explain the menstrual process to the students.

meanings.sent1: The club had its menstrual meetings on the first Monday of each month.
meanings.sent2: The magazine featured a menstrual horoscope section every issue.
meanings.sent3: His car seemed to have a menstrual breakdown every four weeks.
meanings.sent4: The town's menstrual festival brought joy to the community every month.
meanings.sent5: The clock's chime marked the start of the menstrual event on schedule.
